price: Sana keessa mallattootu jira, Irra hedduun isaanii kan amanan hin taane.
arabic: إِنَّ فِي ذَٰلِكَ لَأٓيَةٗۖ وَمَا كَانَ أَكۡثَرُهُم مُّؤۡمِنِينَ

version.title: Oromo translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Oromo by Ghaly Ababour Abaghuna, printed in 2009.

meta.transliteration: inna fī dhālika laāyatan wamā kāna aktharuhum mu'minīna
